contents.text: Welcome to Robert Half San Francisco, connecting top talent and leading employers across finance, law, technology and more.
For job seekers looking to start or advance your career, press 1.
To explore temporary, contract, or full-time job opportunities, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a job placement specialist.

navigationGoals: Connect me to a specialist who can quickly help me find temporary or contract finance roles in San Francisco.
I’d like to explore temporary, contract, or full-time tech roles geared toward veterans.
Connect me to a placement specialist to discuss contract or full-time software engineer positions.
I’m a senior looking for full- or part-time finance work and would appreciate help finding opportunities.
I want to explore contract or full-time data analysis roles where my physics background is valued.

contents.text: To speak directly with a staffing professional, press 2.
Please hold while we transfer you to a staffing consultant.

navigationGoals: Put me through to a staffing professional so I can discuss full-time technology opportunities right away.
I want to speak directly with a staffing consultant about transitioning from the military into a civilian career.
Speak with a staffing consultant for resume optimization and interview prep for a DevOps engineer role.
I’m an older job seeker and need to speak with a staffing consultant about available positions.
I need to speak with a staffing consultant about positioning my physics degree for internships in finance or tech.

contents.text: If you are an employer seeking skilled professionals, press 2.
To post a new position or discuss hiring solutions, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to an employer services expert.

navigationGoals: I need to post a new position for our legal team and review your hiring solutions.
I’m a veteran entrepreneur and need to post a new job opening and discuss hiring solutions.
Post a new backend developer requisition and evaluate recruitment solutions.
I’m an older business owner needing to post a new job opening and would appreciate assistance.
I’d like to post a new listing for a student lab assistant position in my physics research group.

contents.text: To follow up on an existing job order, press 2.
Please hold while we retrieve your job order details.

navigationGoals: I want to check the status of my existing job order for an accounting role.
I’m calling to follow up on a job order I submitted for staffing my veteran-owned business.
Follow up on the status of my open cybersecurity engineer job order.
I’m an elderly employer checking on a job order I placed earlier and need to know its status.
I need to follow up on the status of the job order I submitted for hiring an undergraduate researcher.
